https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fQQEMH9pV9SD7e9DsnGR1Q7emq8.jpg A pseudo-historical movie that follows a modern day elementary schooler as he's tossed back into time to observe Aterui--a real leader of the Ainu (indigenous Japanese) who fights against the Imperial Court. Aterui
